Source code for pygeotoolbox.testing.generalization.generalizationtestset

#  -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
__author__ = "radek.augustyn@email.cz"


from sharedtools import WellKnownClass, TypedList
from generalizationtest import GeneralizationTest
from cartographicmodel import CartographicModel
from mapsymbol import MapSymbol
from symbolconstraint import SymbolConstraint
from renderingcomponent import RenderingComponent



[docs]class GeneralizationTestSet(WellKnownClass):
    def __init__(self, name, description):
        WellKnownClass.__init__(self, name, description)
        self.tests = TypedList(GeneralizationTest)

    def __iter__(self):
        return self.tests


[docs]    def append(self, test):
        self.tests.append(test)




[docs]    def buildHTML(self):
        result = "<table>\n"
        for test, index in zip(self.tests, range(len(self.tests))):
            result += "\t<tr><td>%d</td><td>%s</td></tr>\n" % (index + 1, test.name)
        result += "</table>\n"

        return result



if __name__ == "__main__":
    noGraphicColisionConstraintClass = WellKnownClass("No graphic colision constraint")
    paralelizationConstraintClass = WellKnownClass("Paralelization constraint")
    shareOutlineConsraintClass = WellKnownClass("Share outline")
    tickShorteningConstraintClass = WellKnownClass("Tick can be shorter")

    DARK_GRAY_COLOR = WellKnownClass("Dark gray")
    FLAT_ENDCAP = WellKnownClass("Flat EndCap")
    RENDERED_LINE_COMPONENT = "Rendered Line"
    LINE_DASH_PATTERN_COMPONENT = "Line pattern"
    LINE_TICK_COMPONENT = "Line tick"

    model = CartographicModel()

    colisionConstraint = SymbolConstraint(noGraphicColisionConstraintClass, { "treshold": 0.25})

    # Trail symbol definition
    L2470000 = model.append(MapSymbol("L2470000", "Trail"))
    L2470000.renderingComponents.append(RenderingComponent("Trail", { "componentType": RENDERED_LINE_COMPONENT, "lineWidth": 0.3, "color": DARK_GRAY_COLOR, "endCap": FLAT_ENDCAP }))
    L2470000.rules.append(colisionConstraint)

    # Terrain edge definition
    L6060100 = model.append(MapSymbol("L6060100", "Terrain edge"))
    L6060100.rules.append(colisionConstraint)
    L6060100.rules.append(SymbolConstraint(paralelizationConstraintClass, { "minDistance": 0.25, "maxDistance": 2, "minParalelLength": 5 } ))
    L6060100.rules.append(SymbolConstraint(shareOutlineConsraintClass, { "maxDistance": 2, "minParalelLength": 5, "left": False } ))
    L6060100.renderingComponents.append(RenderingComponent("Relief edge line", { "componentType": RENDERED_LINE_COMPONENT, "lineWidth": 0.13, "color": DARK_GRAY_COLOR, "endCap": FLAT_ENDCAP }))
    L6060100_edgeTick = RenderingComponent("Relief edge tick",  { "componentType": LINE_TICK_COMPONENT, "lineWidth": 0.13, "color": DARK_GRAY_COLOR, "endCap": FLAT_ENDCAP, "angle": 90.0 })
    L6060100_innerTick = RenderingComponent("Relief inner tick", {"componentType": LINE_TICK_COMPONENT, "lineWidth": 0.13,  "color": DARK_GRAY_COLOR, "endCap": FLAT_ENDCAP, "angle": 90.0})
    L6060100_innerTick.rules.append(SymbolConstraint(tickShorteningConstraintClass, { "lengths": [+2*0.7/3, +0.7/3], "maxShortSequence": 3, "minLongSequence": 3, "minEdgeLongSequence": 1 }))
    L6060100.renderingComponents.append(RenderingComponent("Relief dash pattern", { "componentType": LINE_DASH_PATTERN_COMPONENT, "dashes": 0.7, "edgeTick": L6060100_edgeTick, "innerTick": L6060100_innerTick }))

    # Tests definition
    tests = GeneralizationTestSet("Zářezy, náspy, strže", "")

    test = GeneralizationTest("TB04CUZK001, situace č.1", "")
    test.model = model
    tests.append(test)

    print tests.buildHTML()
